animeTitle: Chou Seimeitai Transformers Beast Wars Neo
animeDescription: Beast Wars Neo was a television series that aired in Japan in 1999, in support of the toyline of the same name. It directly follows Beast Wars II.  The show follows the adventures of a crew of Maximals, commanded by Big Convoy, as they compete with Magmatron's evil Predacons to collect the Angolmois energy capsules, scattered at the end of Beast Wars II.
animeStaff: [['Tanaka Kazuya', ['Sound Director']], ['Hayashi Yuzo', ['Music']], ['Sekita Osamu', ['Series Production Director']], ['Takegami Junki', ['Series Composition']]]
